title: snowdown skin for gangplank
body: The q is a snowball that he fires. His w is him drinking some hot chocolate. His e are snowman instead of barrels. And his r is snowfall and the death upgrade is a massive falling snowball. I would have some pictures but I'm a terrible at drawing.

replies.body:
Turn the R into a snowstorm, death upgrade could be a giant Ice chunk, give some nice VO and nice effects.

would be an effective 1850 skin.

What about some presents instead of Barrels?
Really dig the hot choco oranges tho
Yeah that was my other idea, the problem then it would basically be a updated toy solder gangplank.
